Package com.peyrona.mingle.controllers.sysmon

Class SystemMetrics

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.peyrona.mingle.controllers.sysmon.SystemMetrics
  • public final class SystemMetrics
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides basic information about usage in: RAM, Disks and CPU.

    Note: The number of Root FSs and their total space is read only once: when the number od them or capacity changes, the application that calls here must be rebooted.

    Author:
    Francisco Jos√© Morero Peyrona Official web site at: https://github.com/peyrona/mingle

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static float getCpuLoad()
      Returns the "recent CPU usage" for the whole system between 0.0 and 1.0.
      static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Long> getFreeSpace()
      Returns the amount of machine free disk in bytes.
      static float getJvmCpuLoad()
      Returns the "recent CPU usage" for the Java Virtual Machine process.
      static long getJvmCpuTime()
      Returns the CPU time used by the process on which the Java virtual machine is running in nanoseconds.
      static long getJvmFreeMemory()
      Returns free JVM memory.
      static long getJvmTotalMemory()  
      static int getProcessors()  
      static float getSystemLoadAverage()
      Returns System Load Average between 0.0 and 1.0.
      static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Long> getTotalSpace()
      Returns the total amount of machine disk capacity in bytes.
      static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Long> getUsedSpace()
      Returns the amount of machine used disk in bytes.
